56 BIBLIOGRAPHY

tional Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium , pp. 2739–2744, IEEE, 2024.
22

deep learning,” Journal of Big Data , vol. 6, no. 1, p. 60, 2019. 23

2022. 25
[67] H. Rezatofighi, N. Tsoi, J. Gwak, A. Sadeghian, I. Reid, and S. Savarese, “Gener-
alized intersection over union: A metric and a loss for bounding box regression,”

nition, pp. 658–666, 2019. 25, 26

age dataset for ship recognition and some new baselines,” in Proceedings of the
